Html: Are there any plans of porting Prism 2.1 to Unity 2.0?

Hi,

This blog post from the p&p team blog provides some information about the next Prism version and the plans to use Unity 2.0, so perhaps you can find it useful. You might also find that this article from the Prism KB provides some useful information, as it explains the necessary steps to update the current Prism version to Unity 2.0 (and also provides a downloadable version).

Please let me know if this helps.
